title: Can't launch LoL!!! Please help
body: I've been looking at different threads and tried different "solutions" but they don't work, I can't get my LoL to launch. When I press launch, it only shows the LoL icon for a while and then it disappears. Please can someone help me!!!!!!!

replies.body:
That sounds like an issue where your copy of League might not have the correct permissions setup to allow League to access the files it needs to run. You can usually narrow it down to this anytime you see League "start" to open, but never actually pop up. 

Run through our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure those settings get updated, and let me know if that doesn't fix it!
